markdown: 16. Courses in which you wish to enroll: (Please read instructions carefully and check the appropriate boxes). A.M. Schedule Fundamentals of Biostatistics M-T-W-Th-F. If you have selected this course, do not select the following morning courses: Alternate option Principles and Methods of Epidemiologic Research T-Th-S: [x] or option Epidemiology of Occupational Hazards T-Th-S: [ ] and option Epidemiology of Cancer M-W-F: [x] (most IMPORTANT as I am employed under a Cancer Center Grant) or option Epidemiology of Cardiovascular Diseases M-W-F: [ ] P.M. Schedule - Fundamentals of Epidemiology M-T-Th-F If you have selected this course, do not select the following afternoon courses: Alternate option Health Services Planning and Evaluation T-Th: [x] or option Epidemiology of Injuries T-Th: [ ] and option Infectious Disease Epidemiology M-W-F: [ ] or option Epidemiology of Nutritional Diseases and Abnormalities M-W-F: [x] 17. Please make the following room reservation for me: 1 Middlebrook Hall (Two in a room, twin beds) Arrive 6/20 Depart 7/10 A <::attestation: Signature of Applicant Signed Signature: Mark D. Andow Readable Text: 18. Signature of Applicant, Date, 3/25, B & Rantornach Handwritten signature and date on a line, with a label 'Signature of Applicant' to the left and 'Date' before the date.::> <::attestation: Signature for approval Status: Approved Signature: legible (J. S. Uusien gek) Readable Text: 19. I approve of this application, Department Chairman or Adviser A handwritten signature on a line, positioned next to an approval statement, with a role description below.::> Send this form with check for $25.00, made payable to the University of Minnesota, to: Dr. Leonard M. Schuman, Program Director, Epidemiology Summer Session, Division of Epidemiology, Room 1-117 Unit A, Health Sciences Building, University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minnesota 55455. APPLICATIONS MUST BE RECEIVED BY MAY 17. <::logo: Unknown Let Yourself Grow! A circular logo with white text "Let Yourself Grow!" on a dark, textured background.::> The University of Minnesota adheres to the principle that all persons shall have equal opportunity and access to facilities in any phase of University activity without regard to race, creed, color, sex, age or national origin. Under this principle, educational, cultural, social, housing, extra curricular and employment opportunities are available to all on an equal basis.

chunks.markdown: 16. Courses in which you wish to enroll: (Please read instructions carefully and check the appropriate boxes).
A.M. Schedule Fundamentals of Biostatistics M-T-W-Th-F. If you have selected this course, do not select the following morning courses:

Alternate option Principles and Methods of Epidemiologic Research T-Th-S: [x] or option Epidemiology of Occupational Hazards T-Th-S: [ ] and option Epidemiology of Cancer M-W-F: [x] (most IMPORTANT as I am employed under a Cancer Center Grant) or option Epidemiology of Cardiovascular Diseases M-W-F: [ ]
P.M. Schedule - Fundamentals of Epidemiology M-T-Th-F If you have selected this course, do not select the following afternoon courses:

Alternate option Health Services Planning and Evaluation T-Th: [x] or option Epidemiology of Injuries T-Th: [ ] and option Infectious Disease Epidemiology M-W-F: [ ] or option Epidemiology of Nutritional Diseases and Abnormalities M-W-F: [x]
17. Please make the following room reservation for me: 1 Middlebrook Hall (Two in a room, twin beds) Arrive 6/20 Depart 7/10 A

<::attestation: Signature of Applicant Signed Signature: Mark D. Andow Readable Text: 18. Signature of Applicant, Date, 3/25, B & Rantornach Handwritten signature and date on a line, with a label 'Signature of Applicant' to the left and 'Date' before the date.::>

<::attestation: Signature for approval Status: Approved Signature: legible (J. S. Uusien gek) Readable Text: 19. I approve of this application, Department Chairman or Adviser A handwritten signature on a line, positioned next to an approval statement, with a role description below.::>

Send this form with check for $25.00, made payable to the University of Minnesota, to: Dr. Leonard M. Schuman, Program Director, Epidemiology Summer Session, Division of Epidemiology, Room 1-117 Unit A, Health Sciences Building, University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minnesota 55455.
APPLICATIONS MUST BE RECEIVED BY MAY 17.
<::logo: Unknown Let Yourself Grow! A circular logo with white text "Let Yourself Grow!" on a dark, textured background.::>

The University of Minnesota adheres to the principle that all persons shall have equal opportunity and access to facilities in any phase of University activity without regard to race, creed, color, sex, age or national origin. Under this principle, educational, cultural, social, housing, extra curricular and employment opportunities are available to all on an equal basis.
